sources.title: Near Extinction: Shangri-La | Full Movie | Post-Apocalyptic Survival Sci-Fi | Eric Szmanda
sources.description:
Near Extinction: Shangri-La - Mankind is nearly extinct in this post-apocalyptic creature thriller. Most humans died from a deadly plague and the ice age they manufactured to eradicate it.  A man named Vargas leads a group of survivors on a quest to reach Shangri-La, the last safe haven on Earth. However, they must fight through the cold, a mutant cult and a pack of deadly creatures to get there.
2018.  Stars: Eric Szmanda, Sara Malakul Lane, Ewan Chung
